Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Vase
Description: Miniature tube-shaped vase with a flat circular base, and a small flared foot, misshapen in certain areas. The body bulges slightly near the bottom and is asymmetrical. Forty-seven vessels fo this type were found in the same foundation deposit.
